content: {A心虚目移}........... <style=SizeSmall>S-She was messing with me, right?</style>

content: {A思考}So that's how it works: the Luca we get from activities helps the planet grow, and a healthily-grown planet will see the arrival of even more new lifeforms!

content: But you know what? Sani just told me a secret! If I shout "Hocus-pocus" three times and bow to the sun, the Luca sprout will grow faster!

content: "The best shoes are those that are most comfortable, not the most expensive ones."
